00010 void EnableOpenGL(HWND hwnd, HDC* hDC, HGLRC* hRC)
00011 {
00012     PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd;
00013 
00014     int iFormat;
00015 
00016     /* get the device context (DC) */
00017     *hDC = GetDC(hwnd);
00018 
00019     /* set the pixel format for the DC */
00020     ZeroMemory(&pfd, sizeof(pfd));
00021 
00022     pfd.nSize = sizeof(pfd);
00023     pfd.nVersion = 1;
00024     pfd.dwFlags = PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW |
00025                   PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL | PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER;
00026     pfd.iPixelType = PFD_TYPE_RGBA;
00027     pfd.cColorBits = 24;
00028     pfd.cDepthBits = 16;
00029     pfd.iLayerType = PFD_MAIN_PLANE;
00030 
00031     iFormat = ChoosePixelFormat(*hDC, &pfd);
00032 
00033     SetPixelFormat(*hDC, iFormat, &pfd);
00034 
00035     /* create and enable the render context (RC) */
00036     *hRC = wglCreateContext(*hDC);
00037 
00038     wglMakeCurrent(*hDC, *hRC);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void DisableOpenGL (HWND hwnd, HDC hDC, HGLRC hRC)
00042 {
00043     wglMakeCurrent(NULL, NULL);
00044     wglDeleteContext(hRC);
00045     ReleaseDC(hwnd, hDC);
00046 }

00051 LRESULT CALLBACK WindowProc(HWND hwnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00052 {
00053     switch (uMsg)
00054     {
00055         case WM_CLOSE: {
00056             PostQuitMessage(0);
00057             exit(1);
00058             break;
00059         }
00060 
00061         case WM_DESTROY:
00062         {
00063             return 0;
00064         }
00065 
00066         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
00067         {
00068 
00069             int x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
00070             int y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
00071 
00072             Input_Event E;
00073             E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00074             E.Event_Data.push_back(MOUSE_DOWN);
00075             E.Event_Data.push_back(x);
00076             E.Event_Data.push_back(y);
00077 
00078             iPB->AddQueue(E);
00079             lMouseButtonDown = true;
00080             return 0;
00081         }
00082 
00083         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
00084         {
00085             int x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
00086             int y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
00087 
00088             Input_Event E;
00089             E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00090             E.Event_Data.push_back(MOUSE_UP);
00091             E.Event_Data.push_back(x);
00092             E.Event_Data.push_back(y);
00093 
00094             iPB->AddQueue(E);
00095             lMouseButtonDown = false;
00096             return 0;
00097         }
00098 
00099         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
00100         {
00101             if (lMouseButtonDown) {
00102                 int x = GET_X_LPARAM(lParam);
00103                 int y = GET_Y_LPARAM(lParam);
00104 
00105                 Input_Event E;
00106                 E.Event_ID = input_event_button_one;
00107                 E.Event_Data.push_back(MOUSE_MOTION);
00108                 E.Event_Data.push_back(x);
00109                 E.Event_Data.push_back(y);
00110 
00111                 iPB->AddQueue(E);
00112             }
00113             return 0;
00114         }
00115 
00116         case WM_KEYDOWN:
00117         {
00118             switch (wParam)
00119             {
00120                 case VK_ESCAPE:
00121                     PostQuitMessage(0);
00122                 break;
00123 
00124                 case 0x30:
00125                 case VK_NUMPAD1:
00126                 {
00127                     if (iPB)
00128                     {
00129                         Input_Event E;
00130                         E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00131                         E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_1);
00132                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00133                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00134                     }
00135                     break;
00136                 }
00137 
00138                 case 0x53:
00139                 {
00140                     Input_Event E;
00141                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00142                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_S);
00143                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00144                     if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false) {
00145                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00146                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00147                     }
00148                     break;
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 case 0x41:
00152                 {
00153                     Input_Event E;
00154                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00155                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_A);
00156                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00157                     if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false) {
00158                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00159                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00160                     }
00161                     break;
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 case 0x44:
00165                 {
00166                     Input_Event E;
00167                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00168                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_D);
00169                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00170                     if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false) {
00171                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00172                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00173                     }
00174                     break;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 case 0x43:
00178                 {
00179                     Input_Event E;
00180                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00181                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_C);
00182                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00183                     if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false) {
00184                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00185                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00186                     }
00187                     break;
00188                 }
00189 
00190                 case 0x57:
00191                 {
00192                     Input_Event E;
00193                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00194                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_W);
00195                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = false;
00196                     if (KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] == false) {
00197                         KeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00198                         iPB->AddQueue(E);
00199                     }
00200 
00201                     break;
00202                 }
00203 
00204             }
00205         }
00206         break;
00207 
00208         case WM_KEYUP:
00209         {
00210             switch (wParam) {
00211                 case 0x53:
00212                 {
00213                     Input_Event E;
00214                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00215                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_S);
00216                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00217                     printf("Event Data 0 %i\n", E.Event_Data[0]);
00218                     break;
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 case 0x41:
00222                 {
00223                     Input_Event E;
00224                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00225                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_A);
00226                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00227                     break;
00228                 }
00229 
00230                 case 0x44:
00231                 {
00232                     Input_Event E;
00233                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00234                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_D);
00235                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00236                     break;
00237                 }
00238 
00239                 case 0x43:
00240                 {
00241                     Input_Event E;
00242                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00243                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_C);
00244                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00245                     break;
00246                 }
00247 
00248                 case 0x57:
00249                 {
00250                     Input_Event E;
00251                     E.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00252                     E.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_W);
00253                     sKeysDown[E.Event_Data[0]] = true;
00254 
00255                     break;
00256                 }
00257             }
00258         }
00259         break;
00260 
00261         default:
00262             return DefWindowProc(hwnd, uMsg, wParam, lParam);
00263     }
00264 
00265     return 0;
00266 }

00268 bool W32Win::create(const char * Title, int Width, int Height, Postbox<Input_Event>* input_postbox)
00269 {
00270     iPB = input_postbox;
00271     m_winWidth = Width;
00272     m_winHeight = Height;
00273 
00274         /* register window class */
00275     wcex.cbSize = sizeof(WNDCLASSEX);
00276     wcex.style = CS_OWNDC;
00277     wcex.lpfnWndProc = WindowProc;
00278     wcex.cbClsExtra = 0;
00279     wcex.cbWndExtra = 0;
00280     wcex.hInstance = 0;
00281     wcex.hIcon = LoadIcon(NULL, IDI_APPLICATION);
00282     wcex.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
00283     wcex.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH)GetStockObject(BLACK_BRUSH);
00284     wcex.lpszMenuName = NULL;
00285     wcex.lpszClassName = "SimpleEngineC";
00286     wcex.hIconSm = LoadIcon(NULL, IDI_APPLICATION);;
00287 
00288 
00289     if (!RegisterClassEx(&wcex))
00290         return 0;
00291 
00292     printf("Width Height %i %i\n", m_winWidth, m_winHeight);
00293 
00294     /* create main window */
00295     hwnd = CreateWindowEx(0,
00296                           "SimpleEngineC",
00297                           Title,
00298                           WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW,
00299                           CW_USEDEFAULT,
00300                           CW_USEDEFAULT,
00301                           m_winWidth,
00302                           m_winHeight + 40,
00303                           NULL,
00304                           NULL,
00305                           0,
00306                           NULL);
00307 
00308     ShowWindow(hwnd, SW_SHOWDEFAULT);
00309 
00310     EnableOpenGL(hwnd, &hDC, &hRC);
00311 
00312     return true;
00313 }

00320 void W32Win::update()
00321 {
00322     while (PeekMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE))
00323     {
00324         /* handle or dispatch messages */
00325         if (msg.message == WM_QUIT)
00326         {
00327             //Send a quit message
00328             Input_Event Ev;
00329             Ev.Event_ID = input_event_keypressed;
00330             Ev.Event_Data.push_back(KEY_0);
00331             iPB->AddQueue(Ev);
00332         }
00333         else
00334         {
00335             TranslateMessage(&msg);
00336             DispatchMessage(&msg);
00337         }
00338     }
00339 
00340 
00341     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 256; i++)
00342     {
00343         if (sKeysDown[i] == true) {
00344             printf("Key %i up\n", i);
00345 
00346             Input_Event E;
00347             E.Event_ID = input_event_keyreleased;
00348             E.Event_Data.push_back(i);
00349             iPB->AddQueue(E);
00350 
00351             sKeysDown[i] = false;
00352             KeysDown[i] = false;
00353         }
00354     }
00355 }
